resources.string:
Welcome to the Video Authentication Protocol Demo!

The purpose of the demo is to demonstrate a new model for non-repudiation, integrity and authentication of videos. This means someone can prove that a video was recorded by their device.

The protocol works by interacting components provided by the device manufacturer.

Video Authentication Server - .

Video Authentication Client - .

Download the source code to this app or server code at GitHub.

Video Authentication Protocol Project

Demo One: Select test data to upload.

After downloading the test server, this form can upload a metadata JSON file and video to the test server.

In a complete prototype of the framework, a video\'s metadata will do this automatically, record and queue to upload to the device manufacturer\'s datacenter.
Your device does not support Google Maps. Locations will be displayed in a list. To get an interactive map view, use a real device supporting OpenGL ES 2.0. Any model made after 2010 should be fine.
